evidence.claim: All About Home Care Inc. emphasizes HIPAA compliance on their website, indicating a focus on health data security.
The company mentions their commitment to secure handling of health information relevant to home care services, aligning with industry standards.
They provide information related to electronic data interchange (EDI) systems that are compliant with industry health regulations.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transactions or specific EDI use cases.
